changeSet.author: Vinay, Mihir, Dinesh
changeSet.comment: Insert concept set members for Dose Quantity Units
changeSet.sql: insert into concept_set(concept_id, concept_set, sort_weight, creator, date_created, uuid) (select c2.concept_id as concept_id, c1.concept_id as concept_set, 0 as sort_weight, 1 as creator, now() as date_created, uuid() as uuid from concept c1, concept c2, global_property gp where gp.property = 'order.drugDispensingUnitsConceptUuid' and c1.uuid = gp.property_value and c2.concept_id in (select distinct dosage_form from drug));
